mapper.insert: insert into sample_school_courses (COURSE_NO, COURSE_NAME, COURSE_TYPE, COURSE_YEAR, COURSE_TERM, COURSE_QUOTA, COURSE_ROOM, COURSE_BUILDING, COURSE_AVAILABLE, COURSE_REGISTERED_COUNT, PROFESSOR_ID, DEPARTMENT_NO) values (course_seq.nextval,#{name},#{type},#{year},#{term},#{quota},#{room},#{building},#{available},#{registeredCount},#{professorNo})
mapper.select: select COURSE_NO as no COURSE_NAME as name COURSE_TYPE as type COURSE_YEAR as year COURSE_TERM as term COURSE_QUOTA as quota COURSE_ROOM as room COURSE_BUILDING as building COURSE_AVAILABLE as available COURSE_REGISTERED_COUNT as registeredCount PROFESSOR_ID as professorNo DEPARTMENT_NO as departmentNo COURSE_CREATED_DATE as createdDate from sample_school_courses where course_no = #{value}
